disabled.description: If true, panel cannot be opened or closed
disabled.description_zh: 禁用后的面板展开与否将无法通过用户交互改变

forceRender.description: Forced render of content on panel, instead of lazy rending after clicking on header
forceRender.description_zh: 被隐藏时是否渲染 DOM 结构

:key.description: Unique key identifying the panel from among its siblings

showArrow.description: If false, panel will not show arrow icon
showArrow.description_zh: 是否展示当前面板上的箭头

:extra.description_zh: 自定义渲染每个面板右上角的内容
